channel.title: [PI] Error connecting to server.?
channel.description: I have it port fowarded and I have my no-ip in the correct places.. But for some reason it instantly comes up 'error connecting to server' for others. I have no idea why.

item.title: [PI] Error connecting to server.?
item.dc:creator: @spearo spearo
item.description:
@spearo wrote:

1 does the server say its online when you use the server status/port checker? If not then its a port forwarding error.

2 if it says that it is online, then you must have a client error, so if its this then: open client.java, change the localhost to your server ip, save, compile, and redistribute the client.

–

Also some people need to remove their firewall for their portforwarding to work, or make sure it allows those ports.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Error connecting to server.?
item.dc:creator: @clawzkillall clawzkillall
item.description:
@clawzkillall wrote:

I did both, can someone teamview me and help me?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Error connecting to server.?
item.dc:creator: @spearo spearo
item.description:
@spearo wrote:

either you did not portforward correctly, meaning you didn’t portforward or you did not change the no-ip client sided.

Good luck
